# ReSKN Clinic
> Last updated: 2026-01-22

## About

ReSKN Clinic is a skin health and confidence clinic based in Windsor, Berkshire, UK. We provide expert skin consultations, personalised treatment plans, and professional laser hair removal, all led by a UK-registered pharmacist. Our approach combines medical expertise with a luxury, personalised experience — focusing on evidence-based skincare, not trends.

Whether you're dealing with acne, pigmentation, sensitivity, ingrown hairs, or seeking long-term hair reduction, we offer tailored solutions to help you achieve healthier, more confident skin.

---

---

## Services

### Skin Consultations
- **Online Skin Consultation** (30 min, £45): Video consultation from the comfort of your home
- **Follow-up Review** (15 min, £20): Check progress and adjust your plan

### Laser Hair Removal
- **Technology**: 808nm diode laser with 4 wavelengths
- **Suitable for**: Fitzpatrick skin types I–V
- **Prices**: From £25 (varies by treatment area)
- **Patch test required**: Free (redeemable against treatment)

---

## Skin Concerns We Treat

- **Acne & Breakouts**: Identifying triggers and creating effective treatment plans
- **Pigmentation & Melasma**: Dark spots, sun damage, and uneven skin tone
- **Sensitive & Reactive Skin**: Rosacea, barrier repair, and calming care
- **Ingrown Hairs**: Long-term solutions via laser hair removal
- **Anti-Ageing**: Fine lines, texture, and firmness

---

## Skincare Ingredients Guide

We provide evidence-informed guidance on popular skincare ingredients:

- Niacinamide (Vitamin B3)
- Hyaluronic Acid
- Vitamin C
- Salicylic Acid (BHA)
- Lactic Acid (AHA)
- Azelaic Acid
- Tranexamic Acid
- Ceramides
- Squalane
- Peptides
- Centella Asiatica (Cica)
- Green Tea Extract
- Panthenol (Vitamin B5)
- Propolis
- Snail Mucin

Full ingredient guides: https://resknclinic.co.uk/ingredients
